name: Gluten-Free Layered Caribbean Chicken Salad
description: Zip up chicken salad with a three-ingredient dressing made from piña colada yogurt and jerk seasoning.
recipeIngredient: 1  (6-oz.) container Yoplait® Original yogurt piña colada
1  cup shredded Monterey Jack cheese (4 oz)
1  can (15 oz) black beans, drained, rinsed
1 1/2  cups diced peeled ripe fresh mango
1/2  cup chopped seeded plum (Roma) tomatoes (1 to 2 medium)
1/2  cup thinly sliced green onions (8 medium)

recipeInstructions.text: In small bowl, mix dressing ingredients until well blended.
In 3- or 4-quart clear glass serving bowl, layer salad ingredients in order listed, except cashews. Spoon dressing evenly over salad; sprinkle cashews over top.
